Package net.sf.sprockets.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActionModePresenter
    Starts ActionModes and can hide them and then restore them with the same instance state.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animators
    Utility methods for working with ViewPropertyAnimators.
    Displays
    Utility methods for working with Displays.
    TextViewHolder
    Holds TextViews that are commonly found in SDK layouts.
    TranslateImagePageChangeListener
    Scales an image so that both dimensions fill its ImageView (similar to CENTER_CROP) and then translates the image when a ViewPager is scrolled to reveal the "cropped" portion.
    ViewHolder
    Base class for the View Holder pattern.
    Views
    Utility methods for working with Views.
    Windows
    Utility methods for working with Windows.
